sentences.en: 'I thought you knowed everything, father,'said the artless boy.
sentences.cn: “ 我以为你什么都知道呢, 爸爸, ” 天真的孩子说.

sentences.en: A woman of artless grace and simple goodness.
sentences.cn: 淡漠雅致而又淳朴善良的女子.

sentences.en: Being innocent and artless, she is loved by all.
sentences.cn: 她如此天真烂熳,真是谁见谁爱!

sentences.en: From then on, I began my love an outspoken , artless boy.
sentences.cn: 也许也是上天的安排, 让我从此开始了漫长的爱情苦旅.

sentences.en: Furthermore. I'm angry with myself. Why am I so restrained and artless in my speech?
sentences.cn: 我并且生气我自己: 怎么我只会那样拘束,不调皮的在应对?

sentences.en: He laughed within himself at this artless story.
sentences.cn: 他听了这些天真的话,心里暗笑.

sentences.en: He smiled as artless as a child of 5.
sentences.cn: 他笑得像个5岁的孩子那样天真烂漫.

sentences.en: Her countenance and a few artless words fully conveyed all her gratitude and delight.
sentences.cn: 她的表情和寥寥几句质朴无华的语言已充分表达了她的感激与高兴.

sentences.en: My artless comment was mistaken for rudeness.
sentences.cn: 我直言不讳的评论被误会为粗暴无礼.

sentences.en: Now the view that girls are artless , in fact, very real essence.
sentences.cn: 现在的女孩子表明上看都很烂漫, 其实骨子里都很现实.
她单纯得令人难以置信。

sentences.en: She was pleased with the girl's artless looks, and gay innocent manner.
sentences.cn: 女孩子那天真未凿的神情, 那快乐纯洁的举止,都使她感到满意.

sentences.en: the artless sincerity of a young child
The child asked many artless questions.
sentences.cn: 那小孩问了许多天真的问题.

sentences.en: You can't get up that naturalness and artless rosy tint in after days.
sentences.cn: 你今后不再会有这种自然和朴实无华的红润脸色.

trans.tran_cn: 单纯的，自然的，不做作的，拙劣的
